alert.note: Alert for Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 24 at 3:01AM CST until December 25 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 21. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected. * WHERE...Inland Kleberg, Inland Nueces, Inland San Patricio, Coastal Aransas, Coastal Kleberg, Coastal Nueces, Coastal San Patricio, Coastal Refugio and Coastal Calhoun Counties. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until noon CST today. For the Freeze Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will exceed 25 degrees this mid-morning but will stay near or below freezing the entire morning.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
